title: Snowman
description: Draw a snowman using circle and loops!

steps.hint: Create a nice dark sky - **type** `background darkblue`
Move the cursor by using `moveTo 250, 400`
Set the stroke to zero so we have no outlines. **Type** `stroke 0`
Next we'll be drawing snow, so **type** `color white`
Create a big base for your snowman. **Type** `circle 150`
Move up by 200 using `move 0, -200`
Add a light gray stroke so we can see when the circles overlap. **Type** `stroke lightgray, 4`
Make the head for your snowman with a `circle` of size `100`
We no longer need an outline, so remove it with `stroke 0`
Now we want to draw the face. From where you are now, `move -50, -20`
First we'll draw the eyes. Change the `color` to `black`.
Make the first eye with `circle 10`.
Now move on to the next eye. **Type** `move 100, 0`
Make the next eye with a `circle` of size `10`
Next, the nose. `Move` the cursor by `-50, 30`
Make the `color orange`
The carrot nose should be made with a `circle 15`
Finally we're going to make more snow. Change the `color` to `white`
Start off a for loop with `for i in [ 0 .. 50 ]`
Inside this loop, move the crosshair to a random position using `moveTo (random 1, 500), (random 1, 500)`
Create a circle at each section using `circle 5`
